column4: Hi, I installed Ubuntu on a netbook and it is a bit slow, is there  a way for me to install the Lubuntu environment inside this same copy of ubuntu and log into that? I read that this used to be possible (see http://ubuntuhelp.tumblr.com/post/1301847558/is-there-a-way-i-can-switch-from-my-installed-regular describes exactly what i want)
you can install lubuntu-desktop and then log into that as an option when you login
